price: [¡Reflexiona!] ¿Qué te hará comprender todo lo que sucederá el Día de la Retribución?
arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma mā adrāka mā yawmu al-dīni
